name: Tunnels of Terror
overview: The floor is lava, the ceiling is lava, the spaceships are deadly, the corridors are protected by destructive beams. If you don't have a really sensitive joystick just hit yourself in the head with a brick and move on to the next game and save yourself the frustration...that is, unless you are looking for a challenge run. Avoid all the instant death and make it through the pernicious path to the next level. Published in Game On 1990/10.
